messages: fb4f63345c7eea91488b2f1a957b138d (13:34): I've seen bad CTPs from microsoft, but what did they do?!
fb4f63345c7eea91488b2f1a957b138d (13:34): it can't even render it's menus properly... O_o
fb4f63345c7eea91488b2f1a957b138d (13:34): (the graphical part, obviously)
78dbc21d2902c96d3067f18f609ca04c (13:35): lol it's the zeroflag effect :P
fb4f63345c7eea91488b2f1a957b138d (13:35): seriously...
fb4f63345c7eea91488b2f1a957b138d (13:35): the font looks like it was rendered on a 640x480 surface, then stretched to fit my 1920x1200...
78dbc21d2902c96d3067f18f609ca04c (13:35): 1. it's beta ... betas suck arse
fb4f63345c7eea91488b2f1a957b138d (13:36): MICROSOFT's betas SUCK.
fb4f63345c7eea91488b2f1a957b138d (13:36): I've been using ff3 beta for a while now...
78dbc21d2902c96d3067f18f609ca04c (13:36): 2. if its so fucked it's not working then I suspect you should report the bug because it's not going to be happening for everyone
fb4f63345c7eea91488b2f1a957b138d (13:36): NO issues.
fb4f63345c7eea91488b2f1a957b138d (13:36): prefect piece of software...
fb4f63345c7eea91488b2f1a957b138d (13:36): I used lots of microsoft betas in the past...
fb4f63345c7eea91488b2f1a957b138d (13:36): nothing but issues.
78dbc21d2902c96d3067f18f609ca04c (13:36): zeroflag: so don't use them
fb4f63345c7eea91488b2f1a957b138d (13:37): plus, you usually can't install the final product afterwards...
78dbc21d2902c96d3067f18f609ca04c (13:37): just because you company makes very good betas doesn't alter the meaning of beta software
fb4f63345c7eea91488b2f1a957b138d (13:37): so, you're suggesting downgrade to XP?
78dbc21d2902c96d3067f18f609ca04c (13:38): to use powershell?
fb4f63345c7eea91488b2f1a957b138d (13:41): no, to not use microsoft betas...
fb4f63345c7eea91488b2f1a957b138d (13:41): speaking of which, when is vista released?
fb4f63345c7eea91488b2f1a957b138d (13:41): I thought it should be out this month?
